A careless admin reused the same prime for two users' RSA keys. One of their encrypted secrets is: 883842125915996310882424148689226662341029528325296248998604739180842325896108842841542069203064289231324036481430675488940497257874754996757848223816097520957535039754490575216075764986184985741272299501634784998604712075994781789

The flag format is flag{...}
n=1498422705447742437733737677137668326324022706142205871379842019227480465068366465159687891213628265153804365157693880959480348122045163006991833705356083546500012129066432052660144370570102350870218312546155116859663598118156539281, e=353507316825260580091222742906129107307837007468805244480068609101724848592832779150366438950348546709222179791703470414032089561719189738113130224513660458034410089817243785700954949449560630970399236738826018313011248352375521323

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{rlzqwrdw}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 883842125915996310882424148689226662341029528325296248998604739180842325896108842841542069203064289231324036481430675488940497257874754996757848223816097520957535039754490575216075764986184985741272299501634784998604712075994781789
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1498422705447742437733737677137668326324022706142205871379842019227480465068366465159687891213628265153804365157693880959480348122045163006991833705356083546500012129066432052660144370570102350870218312546155116859663598118156539281, e=353507316825260580091222742906129107307837007468805244480068609101724848592832779150366438950348546709222179791703470414032089561719189738113130224513660458034410089817243785700954949449560630970399236738826018313011248352375521323
extra_info: p=38709465321129694437903714599985564159191636980250700782774594090941730321155123499555532366961613496232244929045591, q=38709465321129694437903714599985564159191636980250700782774594090941730321155123499555532366961613496232244929045591, Ï†(n)=1498422705447742437733737677137668326324022706142205871379842019227480465068366465159687891213628265153804365157693803540549705862656287199562633734227765163226051627664866503471962487109460040623219201481421193632671133628298448100
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
